nodes.text: Molten men were entities in Mustafarian culture. According to the priestess Sssl, they were known to ward off lizard-crows, creatures that congregated on the lava fields of the volcanic world of Mustafar. During her assault on the fortress of Darth Vader, Mother Sssl likened the molten men's effects on lizard-crows to her attempt to scare the Sith Lord and his Imperial forces away from her world.

Molten men were mentioned in the fifth issue of the comic series Star Wars Adventures: Return to Vader's Castle. The issue was written by Cavan Scott and published by IDW Publishing on October 30, 2019.
